description: This file defines a UI component named Sidebar using the LightningJS framework. It renders a sidebar with categories, enabling selection and highlighting of active categories.

classes.name: Sidebar
classes.description: A UI component for displaying a list of categories in a sidebar, allowing user interaction and category highlighting.

methods.name: itemColor
methods.description: Determines the color of a category item based on whether it is active.

methods.name: emitSelect
methods.description: Handles category selection, updating state and emitting a selectCategory event.
